flawed_nl_solution:
Last year's winner walked 11 miles because 44 / 4 = <<44/4=11>>11
Elroy has to walk 61 miles to collect $44 because 44 / 2.75 = <<44/2.75=61>>61
Elroy will walk 50 more miles because 61 - 11 = <<61-11=50>>50
#### 50

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
